title: Beparanf
author: Beparanf
content: There’s a hype recently in our country about our Billiard legend Efren Bata Reyes dominating the One pocket tournament of Derby City. I want to support him but sadly most of the sportsbook that I’m using doesn’t have this kind of bet offer. Do you know where to bet on this sports? Btw anyone here watching this tournament? Efren is already 68 years but he is dominating even young prodigy and still undefeated. Watching him on this level gives me a goosebumps.

comments.body: If it's a world tournament, then there probably are some lines on sportsbet.io or Stake. But if it's just some other minor tournament then you will have a hard time searching for any available lines that you can bet on for billiards. It's a pretty much popular sport but I don't know why not a lot of bookies are interested in catering it. Perhaps not a lot of interest on to it? But I doubt it. Its viewership can still be huge as a lot of people still follow the sport to this day.
